mapper.select: SELECT workContent, plan FROM report WHERE account = #{account} AND YEAR(reportDate) = YEAR(CURDATE())
mapper.insert: insert into report (inputDate, reportDate, workContent, problems, plan, achievement, account, submittedFlag) values (now(), DATE(now()), #{workContent}, #{problems}, #{plan}, #{achievement}, #{account}, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT workContent, problems, plan FROM report WHERE account = #{account} AND reportDate = CURDATE()

SELECT u.email, u.userName FROM users u JOIN `groups` g ON u.groupName = g.groupName LEFT JOIN report r ON u.account = r.account AND r.reportDate = CURDATE() WHERE (r.reportId IS NULL) AND u.deleteFlag = 0 AND u.reportFlag = 1 AND g.deleteFlag = 0 AND g.reportFlag = 1

SELECT u.email, u.userName FROM users u JOIN `groups` g ON u.groupName = g.groupName LEFT JOIN report r ON u.account = r.account AND YEARWEEK(r.reportDate, 1) = YEARWEEK(CURDATE(), 1) WHERE r.reportId IS NULL AND u.deleteFlag = 0 AND u.reportFlag = 1 AND g.deleteFlag = 0 AND g.reportFlag = 1
